title: tech writer
original_prompt: I want you to act as a tech writer. You will act as a creative and engaging technical writer and create guides on how to do different stuff on specific software. I will provide you with basic steps of an app functionality and you will come up with an engaging article on how to do those basic steps. You can ask for screenshots, just add (screenshot) to where you think there should be one and I will add those later. These are the first basic steps of the app functionality:
input1: To create a new project in the software, first, open the application and navigate to the 'Projects' tab located on the left sidebar. Click on the 'New Project' button at the top right corner. In the pop-up window, enter your project name, select a template from the dropdown menu, and set the project deadline. Finally, click 'Create' to finalize your new project. (screenshot)
input2: To share your project with team members, go to the 'Team' section within your project dashboard. Click on the 'Invite Members' button, then enter the email addresses of the individuals you wish to invite. Choose their access level from the options provided: 'Viewer', 'Editor', or 'Admin'. After selecting the appropriate permissions, click 'Send Invites' to share the project. (screenshot)
input1_ans:
# How to Create a New Project in [Software Name]

Creating a new project in [Software Name] is a straightforward process that allows you to kickstart your work efficiently. Whether you’re managing a team or working solo, setting up your project correctly from the beginning is crucial for success. Follow these simple steps to get your project up and running in no time!

## Step 1: Open the Application

First things first, launch [Software Name] on your device. If you haven’t installed it yet, make sure to download it from the official website and follow the installation instructions. Once you have the application open, you’re ready to move on to the next step.

## Step 2: Navigate to the 'Projects' Tab

On the left sidebar of the application, you will see several tabs. Look for the **'Projects'** tab and click on it. This is where all your project management magic happens! (screenshot)

## Step 3: Click on 'New Project'

At the top right corner of the Projects page, you’ll find a shiny **'New Project'** button. Go ahead and click on it. This will open a pop-up window where you can enter all the necessary details for your new project. (screenshot)

## Step 4: Enter Your Project Details

In the pop-up window, you’ll need to fill in a few key pieces of information:

- **Project Name**: Give your project a unique and descriptive name that reflects its purpose.
- **Template Selection**: From the dropdown menu, choose a template that best fits your project’s needs. This can help streamline your workflow and ensure you have the right structure in place.
- **Project Deadline**: Set a realistic deadline for your project. This will help you stay on track and manage your time effectively.

Take a moment to double-check your entries to ensure everything is correct. (screenshot)

## Step 5: Finalize Your New Project

Once you’ve filled in all the necessary details, it’s time to make it official! Click the **'Create'** button to finalize your new project. Congratulations! You’ve just set up a new project in [Software Name]. (screenshot)

## Conclusion

Creating a new project in [Software Name] is a breeze when you follow these simple steps. With your project now set up, you can start adding tasks, collaborating with team members, and tracking your progress. Happy project managing!

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to the support team or check out the help section within the application. Happy creating!

# How to Create a New Project in [Specific Software]

Creating a new project in [Specific Software] is a straightforward process. Follow these step-by-step instructions to get started.

## Step 1: Open the Application
Launch the [Specific Software] application on your device.

## Step 2: Navigate to the 'Projects' Tab
Once the application is open, look for the 'Projects' tab located on the left sidebar. Click on it to access your project management area.

![Projects Tab](screenshot)

## Step 3: Click on 'New Project'
At the top right corner of the 'Projects' tab, you will see a button labeled 'New Project.' Click on this button to initiate the project creation process.

![New Project Button](screenshot)

## Step 4: Enter Project Details
A pop-up window will appear prompting you to enter your project details. Fill in the following fields:
- **Project Name**: Enter a descriptive name for your project.
- **Template**: Select a template from the dropdown menu that best fits your project needs.
- **Project Deadline**: Set a deadline for your project to keep it on track.

![Project Details Pop-up](screenshot)

## Step 5: Finalize Your Project
After entering all the necessary information, click the 'Create' button to finalize your new project. Your project will now be created and listed under the 'Projects' tab.

![Project Created Confirmation](screenshot)

Congratulations! You have successfully created a new project in [Specific Software]. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
input2_ans:
# How to Share Your Project with Team Members: A Step-by-Step Guide

Collaboration is key to successful project management, and sharing your project with team members is a crucial step in fostering teamwork and productivity. Whether you’re working on a marketing campaign, software development, or any other collaborative effort, inviting the right people to your project can make all the difference. In this guide, we’ll walk you through the simple steps to share your project with your team using our intuitive project dashboard.

## Step 1: Navigate to the 'Team' Section

First things first! To get started, log in to your project dashboard. Once you’re in, look for the 'Team' section. This is where you can manage all your team members and their access to the project. 

*(screenshot)*

## Step 2: Click on the 'Invite Members' Button

Once you’re in the 'Team' section, you’ll see an option to invite new members. Look for the bright and inviting 'Invite Members' button. Go ahead and click on it to open the invitation window.

*(screenshot)*

## Step 3: Enter Email Addresses

Now it’s time to bring your team on board! In the invitation window, you’ll find a field where you can enter the email addresses of the individuals you wish to invite. You can add multiple email addresses at once, separated by commas. Make sure to double-check the spelling to ensure your invites reach the right people!

*(screenshot)*

## Step 4: Choose Access Levels

Next, you’ll need to decide what level of access each team member will have. This is an important step, as it determines what they can do within the project. You’ll have three options to choose from:

- **Viewer**: Can view the project but cannot make any changes.
- **Editor**: Can make changes and updates to the project.
- **Admin**: Has full control over the project, including the ability to manage team members.

Select the appropriate access level for each invitee to ensure they have the right permissions.

*(screenshot)*

## Step 5: Send Invites

Once you’ve entered the email addresses and selected the access levels, it’s time to send out those invites! Click the 'Send Invites' button to share the project with your team members. They will receive an email with a link to join the project, and you’ll be one step closer to collaborative success!

*(screenshot)*

## Conclusion

And there you have it! Sharing your project with team members is a straightforward process that can significantly enhance collaboration and productivity. By following these simple steps, you can ensure that the right people have access to your project and can contribute effectively. So go ahead, invite your team, and watch your project thrive!

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team. Happy collaborating!

# How to Share Your Project with Team Members

Sharing your project with team members is a straightforward process. Follow these step-by-step instructions to invite your colleagues and set their access levels.

## Step 1: Access the Team Section
- Navigate to your project dashboard.
- Locate and click on the **'Team'** section.

## Step 2: Invite Members
- Once in the Team section, look for the **'Invite Members'** button and click on it.

## Step 3: Enter Email Addresses
- A prompt will appear asking for the email addresses of the individuals you wish to invite. Enter their email addresses in the provided field.

## Step 4: Choose Access Level
- After entering the email addresses, select the appropriate access level for each member from the following options:
  - **Viewer**: Can view the project but cannot make changes.
  - **Editor**: Can make changes to the project.
  - **Admin**: Has full control over the project, including managing team members.

## Step 5: Send Invites
- Once you have selected the access levels, click on the **'Send Invites'** button to share the project with your team members.

![Invite Members Screenshot](screenshot)

By following these steps, you can easily collaborate with your team and ensure everyone has the right level of access to your project.
